Articles.Content:
Hello There,

since i didn´t found anything or very rare (here and elsewhere) media about more SSTV eastereggs i would like to ask, if someone recorded and decoded the science signals too. There will be various pictures transmitted via SSTV.  
 

very scary. 

 

PS: i did it just for fun. (MMSSTV). unfortunatly i have only my profile pic to show  ... but it works. 

 

 

Edited November 14, 2018 by sec3

Nope, just the one on Duna.

It was part of an over arching story that was never fully implemented

tnx for reply.  In my oppinion Duna SSTV  on the white hill was some versions ago reimplemented, after it stuck in ground.

PS:  maybe the chatterer _ mod is responsible for the random signal-pictures. 
but I am still worried about the fact, that almost no one (also the famous youtubers on easter-egg hunting) cares about the audio-signal on every science transmission. ;-)

 

 

Edited November 15, 2018 by sec3

On 11/15/2018 at 3:13 AM, sec3 said:

tnx for reply.  In my oppinion Duna SSTV  on the white hill was some versions ago reimplemented, after it stuck in ground.

PS:  maybe the chatterer _ mod is responsible for the random signal-pictures. 
but I am still worried about the fact, that almost no one (also the famous youtubers on easter-egg hunting) cares about the audio-signal on every science transmission. ;-)

The Duna signal is stock.

That audio signal on science transmission is from Chatterer, they even call it an SSTV noise in the settings. You can toggle it on/off if you like.

I suppose most people wouldn't be interested in a mod's "easter egg" if you can even call it that. Although I'm a bit curious to see what the pictures are of.

Edited November 16, 2018 by Rocket In My Pocket

ahhh..

indeed, the soundfiles are in the mod_folder; same as the speech-packs. I decoded some randomly -> works.
I didn´t already know that the speeches in Chatterer are seperated as NASA and russian_like. maybe reversed and filtered i think.  ;-)
it'd be cool if someone took Nova's unfinished idea and actually made a mod for it
